name: McLovin Jr. 藤森 謙也
alma_mater: Universidad Nacional Agraria La Molina University of Strasbourg University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee
party: Cambio 90 (1990–1999), Peru 2000 (2000), Sí Cumple (2006) , People's New Party (2007)
vicepresident: Máximo San Román (1990–92), Jaime Yoshiyama Tanaka (1993–95) , Ricardo Márquez (1995–2000) , Francisco Tudela (2000)
